snippet: After almost 35 years, this specialty-food chain is making its own bread, with the baker, Louis Volle, offering choices like pain de mie and dark chestnut bread.
abstract: Dean & DeLuca, a specialty-food chain, is making its own bread for the first time in its 35-year history.
lead_paragraph: After almost 35 years, this specialty-food chain is making its own bread, with the baker, Louis Volle, offering choices like pain de mie and dark chestnut bread.

headline.seo: For Dean & DeLuca, a Big Leap: Baking Its Own Bread — Food Stuff
headline.main: Dean & DeLuca Baking Its Own Breads
headline.print_headline: Dean & DeLuca Baking Its Own Breads
